text:
="preserve">François Lalande (29 November 1930 – 1 September 2020) was an Algerian-born French actor. He had performed in the theatre, on television, and movies. He was born in Mostaganem, French Algeria. Lalande was known for his roles as Monsieur Ribeaux in "Herbie Goes to Monte Carlo" (1977) and as Mr. Levert in "French Postcards" (1979).
Lalande died on 1 September 2020 in Paris, aged 89.
